[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpzkye6m_i[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability has been detected in the Mongoose networking [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibrary during fuzzing. The issue occurs in the `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function at [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m`, where a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read operation attempts to access memory [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap-allocated buffer. AddressSanitizer has flagged [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis as a heap-buffer-overflow with a SCARINESS score of [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Vulnerability Type[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue is classified as a **heap-buffer-overflow** vulnerability, specifically a[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read operation that occurs beyond the bounds of an allocated heap buffer.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Issue Details[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability manifests during the processing of network packets in the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMongoose TCP/IP stack implementation. The error trace shows:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Location of the overflow**: The invalid read occurs at address [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which is exactly [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region allocated at [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m`.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Call stack**: The overflow happens in the following execution path:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfuzzer harness at `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/test/[0m[95mfuzz.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;36m106[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mTCP/IP receive function at [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;36m897[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP packet handler at `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;36m385[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Memory allocation**: The problematic buffer was allocated in the fuzzer test [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness at `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/test/[0m[95mfuzz.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m95:17[0m[39m` using `malloc`, with a size of [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Important Observations[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The vulnerability is triggered when processing ICMP packets, suggesting [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minadequate bounds checking in the ICMP packet handling logic.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow is a read operation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot a write[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which typically has different [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msecurity implications than write overflows but can still lead to information [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdisclosure or crashes.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer configuration shows it was run with specific parameters: [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`-[0m[33mrss_limit_mb[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m2560[0m[39m -[0m[33mtimeout[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m25[0m[39m -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m -[0m[33mtimeout_exitcode[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m`.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzing engine [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlibfuzzer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with AddressSanitizer successfully detected this [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvulnerability, indicating the memory safety instrumentation is working correctly.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Investigation[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo obtain a comprehensive understanding of this vulnerability, the following code [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msections should be examined:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;36m385[0m[39m`**: The exact line where the [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds read occurs in the `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function. This is the primary location[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof the vulnerability.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function implementation**: The complete ICMP packet handling logic[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto understand how packet data is processed and where bounds checking may be [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minsufficient.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **`[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function at line [0m[1;36m897[0m[39m**: This function calls `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmay provide context on how packet structures are initialized and passed to [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol-specific handlers.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/test/[0m[95mfuzz.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;36m95[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m106[0m[39m`**: While the harness itself is not the root[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcause, understanding how it allocates and structures test data can help reproduce [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe issue and verify the packet structure expectations.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Packet structure definitions**: The `pkt` structure type and related data [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstructures used in the TCP/IP stack to understand the expected memory layout and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize requirements for ICMP packet processing.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **ICMP packet parsing logic**: Any code that extracts or validates ICMP header [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfields, payload length, or other packet attributes before the overflow point.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis Summary[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter thorough analysis of the code and crash report, I've identified the root [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcause of the heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Core Issue[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability occurs in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m384[0m[39m in `src/net_builtin.c`, where [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type` is dereferenced without proper bounds validation. The crash [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhappens with a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m14[0m[39m bytes Ethernet + [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes IP + [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes for ICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhere the ICMP pointer points exactly at or beyond the buffer boundary.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why Existing Validation Is Insufficient[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe validation at line [0m[1;36m803[0m[39m in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis check relies on `pkt->pay.len` being correctly calculated by `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, the check happens AFTER `pkt->icmp` pointer is assigned at line [0m[1;36m802[0m[39m, and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthere may be edge cases where this validation is bypassed or incorrectly calculated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., IP header options, payload length underflow[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Critical Insights from Code Analysis[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **DHCP handlers demonstrate the correct pattern** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m398[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m404[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m459[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m462[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: They[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mperform explicit bounds checking using `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;` BEFORE accessing any structure fields.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` violates defensive programming principles**: It immediately [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdereferences `pkt->icmp->type` without verifying the pointer is within bounds.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **The same vulnerability pattern exists in IPv6 ICMP handling** [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlines [0m[1;36m838[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m844[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Line [0m[1;36m384[0m[39m has an additional issue**: The condition order `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m== [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` evaluates the dereference [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBEFORE checking if `pkt->ip` is NULL, though this is a secondary issue.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Primary Fix: Add Defensive Bounds Checking in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAdd explicit bounds validation at the beginning of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` following the DHCP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler pattern:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location**: `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m384[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbeginning of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function[0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation**:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Add bounds check immediately after the function entry, before any field access[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Calculate the buffer end pointer: `uint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Verify the entire ICMP structure fits within bounds: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Add NULL check for `pkt->icmp` as additional safety: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;`[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Rationale**: This provides defense-in-depth. Even if the caller's validation has [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbugs or edge cases, the handler itself will reject invalid packets. This matches [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe pattern already established by `[0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_server[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Secondary Fix: Improve Validation in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhile the primary fix in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is sufficient to prevent the crash, the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidation in the calling functions should also be strengthened for consistency:[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m**: `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:801[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIPv4 ICMP handling in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation**:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Move the bounds check BEFORE setting `pkt->icmp` pointer[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Add explicit check: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. This ensures we never create an out-of-bounds pointer[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m**: `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:841[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m844[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIPv6 ICMP handling in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation**:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Apply the same fix as for IPv4[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Check: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Fix Is Optimal[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Follows established patterns**: The fix uses the same defensive programming [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpattern already present in DHCP handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m404[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m462[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Defense-in-depth**: Multiple layers of validation ensure the vulnerability [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcannot be triggered even if one layer fails[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Minimal code changes**: The fix is localized and doesn't require refactoring [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting logic[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Preserves functionality**: The fix only adds safety checks; it doesn't change [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe packet processing logic or affect valid packets[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Addresses both IPv4 and IPv6**: The fix applies to both protocol versions[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **No impact on other protocols**: UDP, TCP, ARP, DHCP handlers are unaffected[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Explanation of How It Addresses the Issue[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Prevents out-of-bounds read**: The bounds check in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` will catch any [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket where the ICMP header extends beyond the buffer, regardless of how the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcaller's validation works[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Handles the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte crash case**: For the reported crash [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m14[0m[39m eth + [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m ip + [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the check `end < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` will evaluate to `[0m[1;36m34[0m[39m < [0m[1;36m38[0m[39m`, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturning early and preventing the dereference at line [0m[1;36m384[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Prevents future vulnerabilities**: Even if bugs are introduced in the calling [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode or `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calculation, the handler remains safe[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Maintains existing test compatibility**: Valid ICMP packets will pass the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds check and continue processing normally[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigations[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m**: Truncated ICMP packets will be silently dropped[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Mitigation**: This is the correct behavior for malformed packets; no action [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneeded[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m**: Very minor performance overhead from additional bounds checks[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Mitigation**: The overhead is negligible [0m[1;39m([0m[39mone comparison per ICMP packet[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis a worthwhile trade-off for security[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m**: [0m[3;35mNone[0m[39m expected - the fix only adds safety checks without changing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Reference to Similar Solutions[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix directly mirrors the validation pattern in:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at lines [0m[1;36m401[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m404[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_server[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at lines [0m[1;36m460[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m462[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThese functions explicitly document the approach with the comment: [0m[32m"perform size [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mcheck first, then access fields"[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m401[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which is exactly what this fix [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimplements for ICMP handling.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpzkye6m_i[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer in the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m`. The overflow[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs when attempting to read [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which is located[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated region. A patch was applied that added bounds [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecking in three locations: at the start of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, in the IPv4 packet [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing path, and in the IPv6 packet processing path. However, after applying [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe patch, the identical heap-buffer-overflow error persists at the same location [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, now line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in the patched version[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, indicating the patch was [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mineffective in resolving the issue.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer report indicates a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read heap-buffer-overflow occurring [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of `net_builtin.c`. The stack trace shows [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe following call sequence:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfuzz.[0m[1;92mc:106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - The fuzzer harness entry point[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - The TCP/IP packet receiver[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - The ICMP packet handler where the overflow [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe overflow occurs when reading from address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which is exactly at[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe boundary of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshadow bytes show the memory layout with `[0m[1;36m02[0m[39m` indicating [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m bytes are partially [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddressable at that location, followed by `fa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mheap redzone[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, confirming the read [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mextends beyond the allocated buffer.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Details[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch added three sets of bounds checks:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m384[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m387[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added calculation of buffer end: `uint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added null check: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added bounds check: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - These checks were placed before line [0m[1;36m388[0m[39m where the actual access occurs: `if [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **In IPv4 processing path [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m806[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Placed before: `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **In IPv6 processing path [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m846[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Placed before: `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the identical error persists:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same crash location: `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset adjusted in patched version[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same address overflow: `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same allocation region: [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same call stack sequence[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same SCARINESS score: [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fact that line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m still shows as the crash location in the patched version [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msuggests the bounds checks added at the beginning of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` are being bypassed[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor are not evaluating correctly. The crash still occurs on the same line: `if [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, indicating [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat the access to `pkt->icmp->type` is reading beyond the allocated buffer.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Packet structure initialization and allocation in `test/fuzz.c`**:[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines around [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m where the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation occurs[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the `pkt` structure is populated and whether all pointers are correctly [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minitialized[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The relationship between `pkt->raw.len`, actual buffer size, and pointer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculations[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **The `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function**:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How it sets up `pkt->pay.len` [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether it correctly validates available buffer space before setting pointers[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Pointer arithmetic in packet parsing**:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Lines [0m[1;36m806[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m846[0m[39m where `pkt->icmp` is assigned as `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip +[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether `pkt->pay.len` check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msufficient[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The ordering of these checks relative to when `pkt->icmp` pointer is [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdereferenced[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **The condition at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpatched[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m388[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39moriginal[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The check `pkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` accesses the ICMP type field[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The bounds check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` validates space for [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe entire ICMP structure[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - However, accessing `pkt->icmp->type` requires only enough space for the type [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfield, not the entire structure[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The calculation may be comparing the wrong values or the pointer may already [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe invalid[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Flow control in `mg_tcpip_rx` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How packets are routed to `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether earlier processing functions modify buffer pointers or lengths[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m871[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x806[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                       [2m                [0m
