[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m873[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.arp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTruncated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m874[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, MG_TCPIP_EV_ARP, &pkt.raw[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m875[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_arp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m876[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x86dd[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:876[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m881[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m876[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x86dd[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m877[0m[39m:    pkt.ip6 = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip6 *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m878[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTruncated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m879[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip6->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0x6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m880[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m881[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:794[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m836[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m807[0m[39m:    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m808[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m809[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m810[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"UDP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m811[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m812[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m813[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_client && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m68[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m814[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m815[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m816[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m817[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_server && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m67[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m818[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m819[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m820[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_server[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m821[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m822[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_udp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m823[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m824[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m825[0m[39m:    pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m826[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m827[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m828[0m[39m:    uint16_t iplen = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m829[0m[39m:    uint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m830[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen >= off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen - off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m831[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"TCP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m832[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m833[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m834[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m835[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m836[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis of the Issue[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe heap-buffer-overflow persists because the previous patch attempted to add [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds checking at the wrong locations and in the wrong order. The core issue is:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Root Cause**: Protocol header pointers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->icmp`, `pkt->udp`, `pkt->tcp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare assigned using pointer arithmetic BEFORE validating they point to valid memory [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithin the buffer bounds.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Secondary Issue**: The `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function calculates payload length using [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer subtraction. When a pointer extends beyond the buffer, the subtraction [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproduces a negative value that wraps around to a large positive number when cast to[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`size_t` [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. This corrupted length value causes subsequent size checks to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpass incorrectly.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Previous Patch Failure**: The patch added checks AFTER calling `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, but [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mby that point `pkt->pay.len` already contains the corrupted [0m[1;39m([0m[39munderflowed[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m value. [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAdditionally, the check in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` was placed after line [0m[1;36m384[0m[39m where the actual [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdereference occurs.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Fix the ICMP handler in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m801[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCurrent code:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFix by adding bounds check immediately after pointer assignment and BEFORE using [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len`:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRemove the check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;` because it's now [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredundant and uses potentially corrupted data.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Fix the UDP handler in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m806[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m823[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mApply the same pattern:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[39m rest of UDP handling[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Fix the TCP handler in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m824[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m835[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[39m rest of TCP handling[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Fix fragmented packet handling [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m796[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m800[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fragmented packet path also assigns pointers without validation:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAdd validation:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m: Fix IPv6 ICMP handler in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m840[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m844[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || pkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m: Fix IPv6 UDP handler in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m845[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m851[0m[1;39m)[0m                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m: Remove the incorrect checks from `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch added checks in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` which are now unnecessary since [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwe're validating at the source. Remove these lines from the beginning of [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m: Validate IPv4 options calculation in `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m[1;39m)[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe IPv4 options handling needs validation before calling `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    size_t hdr_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *pay_start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + hdr_len;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt.raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpay_start > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pay_start[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Correct Validation Order**: By validating immediately after pointer assignment[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut BEFORE calling `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, we prevent the payload length calculation from being [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrupted.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Consistent Pattern**: This follows the same pattern used successfully in the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mDHCP handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m402[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m404[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m460[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m462[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which calculate the buffer end and compare [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mit to the structure end.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Direct Pointer Comparison**: Using `end < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstructure + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdirectly checks if the entire structure fits within the buffer, without relying on [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpotentially corrupted length values.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Removal of Redundant Checks**: The checks on `pkt->pay.len` are removed [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbecause:[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - They occur after `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` which may have already corrupted the value[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The new bounds check is more reliable and happens earlier[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - They create a false sense of security[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Preserves Existing Logic**: All functionality remains intact - we're only [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madding safety checks at the right locations. The packet processing flow, protocol [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling, and feature flags remain unchanged.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **No Harness Modifications**: This fix targets only the source code [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvulnerabilities, not the fuzzing infrastructure.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **Comprehensive Coverage**: All pointer assignments for ICMP, UDP, TCP [0m[1;39m([0m[39mboth [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 and IPv6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and fragmented packets are now protected.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Rejected Packets**: Malformed or truncated packets that previously crashed [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill now be silently rejected. This is the correct behavior.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Performance**: The additional checks add minimal overhead [0m[1;39m([0m[39mone pointer [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomparison per protocol header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **IPv4 Options**: The validation of IPv4 options might reject packets with [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmalformed IHL fields, which is correct behavior per RFC [0m[1;36m791[0m[39m.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Backward Compatibility**: Well-formed packets continue to work exactly as [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore. Only malformed packets that would have caused crashes are now rejected.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/08/26 06:58:25][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=827212;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=511098;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Seed: [0m[1;36m423180144[0m                                                                [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m: Running [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m inputs [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[1;35mtime[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m each.[0m                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRunning: [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m=================================================================[0m                    [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-buffer-overflow on address [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m at pc [0m [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x55d9db94ec02[0m[39m bp [0m[1;36m0x7ffc8d8adc40[0m[39m sp [0m[1;36m0x7ffc8d8adc38[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mREAD of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m thread T0[0m                                           [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mSCARINESS: [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x55d9db94ec01[0m[39m in [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                                [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m                                               [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    #[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;36m0x55d9db936d1a[0m[39m in mg_tcpip_rx [0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m897:5[0m           [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpzkye6m_i[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow error detected by AddressSanitizer [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mduring fuzzing. The error occurs in the `rx_icmp` function at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.c`, where a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read occurs at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which is [0m[1;36m0[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated region. The patch attempt added boundary checks in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmultiple locations within `net_builtin.c` to validate that pointers do not exceed [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe buffer boundaries before dereferencing them. However, after applying the patch,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe exact same heap-buffer-overflow error persists at the same location [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_icmp` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, indicating that the patch did not address the root cause of the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvulnerability.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer discovered a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability with the following [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacteristics:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Error Type**: [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte READ heap-buffer-overflow[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Location**: `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m` in the `rx_icmp` function[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Call Stack**: The error occurs through the path: `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` → `rx_icmp`[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Memory Details**: The overflow occurs at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Allocation Point**: The memory was allocated in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` at [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m of `test/fuzz.c`[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer report shows a SCARINESS score of [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m for this [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow, and the shadow bytes indicate that the accessed [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmemory location is marked as `[0m[1;36m02[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpartially addressable[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, immediately followed by [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mheap left redzone[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempted to add boundary validation checks at multiple locations in the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_ip` and `rx_ip6` functions:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **For fragmented packets** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m794[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added `end` pointer calculation: `uint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added checks before using `pkt->udp` and `pkt->tcp` pointers[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Returns early if `end < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` or `end < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **For ICMP packets** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m808[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m812[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replaced the check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with boundary [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added validation: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **For UDP packets in IPv4** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m814[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m818[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replaced the check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with boundary check[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added validation: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **For TCP packets in IPv4** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m833[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m836[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replaced the check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with boundary check[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added validation: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **For ICMP packets in IPv6** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m850[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m854[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replaced the check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with boundary [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added validation: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **For UDP packets in IPv6** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m856[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m860[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replaced the check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with boundary check[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added validation: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **For IPv4 options handling** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m903[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m910[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added boundary check for IPv4 header with options[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Validates that payload start doesn't exceed buffer end before calling `mkpay`[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Result[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the fuzzer still triggers the exact same error:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same location: `rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of `net_builtin.c`[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same address: `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same memory layout and shadow bytes[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Identical call stack[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis indicates that the boundary checks added in the patch do not prevent the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvalid read that occurs within the `rx_icmp` function itself.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Further Investigation[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo fully understand and address this vulnerability, the following areas should be [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvestigated:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **The `rx_icmp` function**: Since the overflow occurs at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m within this [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction, the implementation of `rx_icmp` needs detailed analysis to identify where[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe out-of-bounds read occurs and what data it's attempting to access.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **The `mkpay` function**: This function is called before `rx_icmp` is invoked [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand appears to set up payload structures. Understanding how it calculates and sets [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `pkt->pay` fields is crucial.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **ICMP packet structure and handling**: The specific ICMP packet structure being[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessed and how its fields are accessed within `rx_icmp` need examination.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **The relationship between `pkt->raw`, `pkt->pay`, and protocol-specific [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstructures**: The patch adds checks based on `pkt->raw.len`, but the original code [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks `pkt->pay.len`. Understanding the difference and correct usage is important.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **The fuzzer input that triggers the issue**: The testcase file at `[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat triggers this overflow should be analyzed to understand what malformed packet [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstructure causes the issue.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Buffer allocation in the fuzzer harness**: While the harness is not the root [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcause, understanding how the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer is constructed in `test/fuzz.c` at line[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m would provide context for what minimal packet structure triggers the overflow.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m752[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mtx_tcp_pkt[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt, TH_ACK, pkt->tcp->ack, NULL, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m753[0m[39m:    c->is_connecting = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Client connected[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m754[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35msettmout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MIP_TTYPE_KEEPALIVE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m759[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mtx_tcp_pkt[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt, TH_RST | TH_ACK, pkt->tcp->ack, NULL, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m760[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc != NULL && pkt->tcp->flags & TH_RST[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m775[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mtx_tcp_pkt[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt, TH_RST | TH_ACK, pkt->tcp->ack, NULL, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m776[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->flags & TH_RST[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m777[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->is_accepted[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"peer RST"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m RFC-[0m[1;36m1122[0m[39m [0m[1;92m4.2.2.13[0m          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m780[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Use peer's source port as ISN, in order to recognise the handshake[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m781[0m[39m:    uint32_t isn = [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
