[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m785[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + 1U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m786[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35maccept_conn[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m787[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!c->is_accepted[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m no peer[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m788[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mtx_tcp_pkt[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt, TH_RST | TH_ACK, pkt->tcp->ack, NULL, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m789[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m790[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"dropped silently.."[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m791[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m792[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:794[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m836[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m829[0m[39m:    uint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m831[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"TCP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m832[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->sport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpzkye6m_i[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reveals a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability in the Mongoose [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnetworking library, specifically in the `rx_icmp` function at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.c`. The AddressSanitizer detected a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read beyond the allocated [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap buffer boundary. A patch was attempted that added boundary checks before [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39massigning protocol-specific packet pointers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP, UDP, TCP, DHCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in the `rx_ip` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand `rx_ip6` functions, as well as in the main packet processing function. However,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafter applying the patch, the same heap-buffer-overflow error persists at the exact[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame location [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, indicating that the patch did not address [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe root cause of the vulnerability.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer report indicates a heap-buffer-overflow occurring when [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing network packets. Key observations include:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error Location**: The overflow occurs in `rx_icmp` function at [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m` with a READ operation of size [0m[1;36m1[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Memory Details**: The read attempts to access address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis located exactly [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocated region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Call Stack**: The error propagates through:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtest/fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - the fuzzer harness[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - main packet receive function[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - ICMP packet handler where the overflow occurs[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Scariness Score**: The vulnerability is rated at [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe shadow bytes visualization shows the memory layout with `[0m[1;36m02[0m[39m` at the buggy [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress, indicating [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m bytes are partially addressable in that [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte chunk, and the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread operation attempts to access the byte immediately following the allocated [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Description[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempted to add boundary validation checks in multiple locations within [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.c`:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **In `rx_ip` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline ~[0m[1;36m794[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added checks before setting `pkt->udp` and `pkt->tcp` in fragmented packet [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added checks before setting `pkt->icmp` for ICMP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprotocol [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added checks before setting `pkt->udp` for UDP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprotocol [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added checks before setting `pkt->dhcp` for DHCP client/server handling [0m[1;39m([0m[39mports[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m/[0m[1;36m67[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added checks before setting `pkt->tcp` for TCP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprotocol [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **In `rx_ip6` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline ~[0m[1;36m863[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added checks before setting `pkt->icmp` for ICMPv6 packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprotocol [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m or [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added checks before setting `pkt->udp` for UDP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprotocol [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **In the main packet processing function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline ~[0m[1;36m919[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added boundary check for IPv4 options handling[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Modified the logic to validate that the payload start pointer doesn't exceed [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer boundaries[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe boundary check pattern used throughout:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t *end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m &pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mprotocol[0m[1;39m][0m[39m_ptr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mprev_header[0m[1;39m][0m[39m + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m[[0m[39mprotocol[0m[1;39m][0m[39m_ptr >= end || [0m[1;39m[[0m[39mprotocol[0m[1;39m][0m[39m_ptr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m[1;39m[[0m[39mprotocol[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mprotocol[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m[1;39m[[0m[39mprotocol[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m[[0m[39mprotocol[0m[1;39m][0m[39m_ptr;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the identical error persists:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same error location: `rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same memory address: `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same allocated region: [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same call stack: `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → `mg_tcpip_rx` → `rx_icmp`[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis indicates that while the patch added boundary checks before assigning protocol[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader pointers, it did not address the actual out-of-bounds read occurring within [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `rx_icmp` function itself at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Further Investigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **The `rx_icmp` function implementation**: Since the error consistently occurs [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m within this function, the actual vulnerability lies in how this [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction processes ICMP packet data after the header pointer has been set. The [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch should examine what specific operation at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m causes the buffer [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **The `mkpay` function**: This function is called multiple times after setting [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol headers [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. It may be involved in setting[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mup the payload boundaries that are later violated.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **The `pkt->pay.len` validation**: Several checks verify `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` but these may not be sufficient to prevent all out-of-bounds [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccesses within the protocol handling functions.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **The fuzzer input processing in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`**: Understanding how [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe test case at line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m allocates the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer and how it's passed to [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` could provide insight into why the buffer is too small.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **IPv4 header length calculation**: The code at line [0m[1;36m919[0m[39m handles IPv4 options [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith `[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` which could result in incorrect header length [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculations if the version field is malformed.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **The relationship between `pkt->raw.len`, protocol header sizes, and payload [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdata**: There may be inconsistencies in how these values are calculated and [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidated throughout the packet processing pipeline.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m885[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis of the Issue[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter analyzing the code snippets and evaluation reports, I've identified the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**root cause** of the heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe code has a fundamental architectural flaw in handling IPv4 packets with [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions:[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Before calling `rx_ip`** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: The code correctly adjusts the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload pointer via `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to account for IPv4 options when IHL > [0m[1;36m5[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Inside `rx_ip`** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m802[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m807[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m825[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Protocol header pointers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP, UDP, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are set to `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, which assumes NO IPv4 options exist[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Result**: When IPv4 options are present, `pkt->icmp` points into the IPv4 [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions area [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor beyond the buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, NOT the actual ICMP header location[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch attempted to add boundary checks before setting protocol [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers, but these checks were insufficient because:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- They validated that `pkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` was within bounds[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- But the actual protocol data starts AFTER the IPv4 options, not at `pkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The mismatch between where `mkpay` positions the payload and where protocol [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers are set causes the overflow[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Additional Issues[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Missing IHL validation**: No validation that the IP Header Length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m field [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis valid and doesn't exceed packet size[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **mkpay underflow**: When the calculated IP header end exceeds `pkt->raw.len`, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mkpay` produces a huge underflowed `pay.len` value that bypasses size checks[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **TCP offset calculation**: Uses base IP header size instead of actual IHL when [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculating payload offset[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Add IHL Validation Before Calling `rx_ip` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLines [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m896[0m[1;39m)[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBefore calling `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, validate that:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The IHL value is at least [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mminimum valid IP header = [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The calculated IP header length doesn't exceed the packet size[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. This prevents `mkpay` from being called with a pointer beyond the buffer[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation:**[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m After line [0m[1;36m890[0m[39m: if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IHL must be at least [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IP header exceeds packet[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Derive Protocol Header Pointers from `pkt->pay.buf` in `rx_ip` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLines [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m836[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mChange all protocol header pointer assignments to use `pkt->pay.buf` instead of [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. This ensures protocol headers are positioned where the payload [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactually starts [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter IPv4 options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Locations to modify:**[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line [0m[1;36m797[0m[39m** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfragmented UDP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: `pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line [0m[1;36m798[0m[39m** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfragmented TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: `pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line [0m[1;36m802[0m[39m** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;`[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line [0m[1;36m807[0m[39m** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mUDP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: `pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;`[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line [0m[1;36m825[0m[39m** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mTCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: `pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;`[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Critical Note:** Remove the previous boundary check patches that validated [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` since we're now using `pkt->pay.buf`. The existing `pkt->pay.len` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m803[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m808[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m826[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will provide sufficient validation because:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calculates `pay.len` as the distance from the payload start to the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer end[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- If the payload pointer is valid, `pay.len` will be correct[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- If the payload pointer is invalid [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcaught by Fix [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, we return early[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Update TCP Payload Offset Calculation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLine [0m[1;36m829[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe TCP handler recalculates payload length using the IP length field. Update it to[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muse the actual IHL instead of the base IP header size:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Implementation:**[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint16_t iplen = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint16_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen >= off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen - off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Fix [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Optional - Update IPv6 for Consistency [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLines [0m[1;36m841[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m846[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFor code consistency and maintainability, update IPv6 protocol header assignments [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto also use `pkt->pay.buf`:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line [0m[1;36m841[0m[39m**: `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;`[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Line [0m[1;36m846[0m[39m**: `pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;`[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis is optional since IPv6 doesn't have the vulnerability [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfixed header size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimproves code consistency.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Approach is Optimal[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses Root Cause**: Fixes the fundamental mismatch between payload [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpositioning and protocol header positioning[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Minimal Changes**: Uses existing `pkt->pay.buf` that's already correctly [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculated by `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Preserves Logic**: Maintains all existing functionality including [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfragmentation handling, DHCP, and protocol processing[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Defense in Depth**: Adds IHL validation as a first line of defense, preventing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmalformed packets from reaching protocol handlers[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Consistent Pattern**: Aligns IPv4 handling with IPv6 handling [0m[1;39m([0m[39mboth use [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload buffer as the source for protocol headers[0m[1;39m)[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Logic[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **No changes to packet processing flow**: All protocol handlers are called in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same order[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **No changes to payload calculations**: `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` logic remains unchanged[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **No changes to protocol structures**: All struct definitions remain the same[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **No changes to DHCP/TCP/UDP/ICMP handlers**: They receive the same data, just [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith correctly positioned pointers[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Maintains fragmentation error reporting**: Fragmented packet handling logic is[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreserved[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses the Issue[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix resolves the heap-buffer-overflow by ensuring:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Pre-validation**: IHL is validated before computing pointer positions [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mprevents mkpay underflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Correct positioning**: Protocol headers point to actual protocol data location[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mafter IPv4 options[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Automatic boundary checking**: Existing `pkt->pay.len` checks validate that [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol headers fit within the payload[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhen the fuzzer provides a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte packet with [0m[33mIHL[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m6[0m[39m:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Old behavior**: `pkt->icmp` points to byte [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m14[0m[39m ETH + [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m IP base[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, beyond the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer → OVERFLOW[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **New behavior**: IHL validation detects that [0m[1;36m14[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m24[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m and returns early → NO[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOVERFLOW[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Side Effect**: Packets with malformed IHL values will be dropped[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: This is correct behavior - malformed packets should be [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrejected[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Side Effect**: Very slight performance impact from additional IHL validation[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: Single comparison operation, negligible overhead[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Side Effect**: Fragmented packets with IPv4 options now have correctly [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpositioned headers[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: This fixes a latent bug; fragmented packets already generate [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merrors anyway[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Patterns in Codebase[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe IPv6 handling [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m876[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m881[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m838[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m851[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m demonstrates the correct pattern:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is called before `rx_ip6`[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Inside `rx_ip6`, protocol headers are set to `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Both use the SAME base position, maintaining consistency[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOur fix applies this same pattern to IPv4 by making protocol headers derive from [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.buf`, which is where `mkpay` positioned the payload.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/08/26 07:16:35][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=310904;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=575295;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
